segments.text: The two children are a perfect team, working in tandem for their forbidden treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the boy's hand reaching deep into that "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture is all about stretching, a real effort to get to the good stuff.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl stands close by, her hand raised, palm open, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even touch the stool, showing such good cooperation in their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's clear they've done this before, or at least they have a well-rehearsed plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way they're so intently focused on the cookies is quite endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must be quite sneaky to pull this off right behind the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet they think they're being incredibly clever, and in a way, they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire operation is carried out with such quiet determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman has any idea what's going on behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret little world is so separate from her calm dishwashing routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a delightful moment of childhood rebellion, albeit a risky one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer anticipation on the girl's face is palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Theyâ€™re just two kids trying to get some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
